taskDescription: The major product of the reaction of methylenecyclohexane with N-bromosuccinimide is 1-(bromomethyl)cyclohexene. Explain.
detailedSolution: The intermediate allylic radical reacts at the more accessible site and gives the more highly substituted double bond.
